definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
coastal region/refers to Russian far east Primorsky Krai

sentences.english: Phet reached its greatest intensity off the coast of Oman on June 3.
sentences.chinese: 6月3日，“钻石”在阿曼沿海达到最大强度。

sentences.english: Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省气象台昨天傍晚发布浙江沿海地区强台风紧急警报。

sentences.english: The closure construction for offshore dyke engineering is different from the closure for river.
sentences.chinese: 沿海堤坝工程的合龙，不同于江河截流。

sentences.english: The sea, at certain parts of the coast, goes out so far that it can no longer be seen.
sentences.chinese: 沿海有些地带，潮落时海水退得很远，连望都望不到。

sentences.english: Aquatic resources along the coast of South America.
The state Department approved Shenzhen city to be a coastal, economic open zone.
sentences.chinese: 国务院批准深圳为沿海经济开放城市。

sentences.english: There is no pollution along Hainan's sea, so its pearl is preeminent.
sentences.chinese: 海南沿海纯净无污染，海南珍珠品质超群。

sentences.english: There were further protests in the coastal city of Hodeida.
sentences.chinese: 沿海城市荷台达也爆发了进一步的抗议活动。

sentences.english: This paper briefly analyzed the development of Liaoning coastal economic belt.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要就辽宁沿海经济带的发展进行了简要的分析。

sentences.english: A string of tiny islands scattered off the Croatian coast are up for sale.
sentences.chinese: 一群散布在克罗地亚沿海的小岛正在出售中。

sentences.english: Haley Barbour said the initial focus was getting coastal residents back into their homes.
sentences.chinese: 州长黑利巴伯说，最初的重点是沿海的居民回家园。

sentences.english: As it approaches the sea, the river meanders over the coastal plain.
sentences.chinese: 快要入海时，印度河在沿海平原里蜿蜒流淌。

sentences.english: Hepu gulf is of unique geographical position for pearl's growing.
sentences.chinese: 合浦沿海得天独厚的海湾是繁衍珍珠的最佳场所。

sentences.english: The tornado disrupted broadcasting along the entire coast.
sentences.chinese: 龙卷风使整个沿海的广播都中断了。

sentences.english: The steamer was beating along the coast.
Climatic suitability of jellyfish breeding in Jiangsu littoral was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究江苏沿海海蛰类养殖的气候适宜性。

definition: along the river/the region around the river
Bohai Sea, or Bo Hai, between Liaoning and Shandong/Parhae, Korean kingdom in Manchuria and Siberia 698-926
dry land (as opposed to the sea)
